author: M Suganth
title: Ramki’s next film is a suspense thriller
text:
Sanjay of Kulir 100° fame is playing the lead in English Padam which also stars Ramki and Meenakshi. The film is directed by Kumaresh Kumar and is said to be a comedy thriller. Says the director, "We have made a comedy thriller in the style of Hollywood films. Revenge is the theme of the film and you will see how the title is apt for this story when you watch the film."
He adds, "Ramki gives a task to Sanjay promising him money in return. Sanjay completes the job, but Ramki cheats him. Now, Sanjay plots his revenge. Ramki plays a rough-and-tough and he sports a salt-and-pepper hairstyle to look menacing. I chose Sanjay because I needed someone who looks like a soft-spoken person. Srija Das plays his pair in the film."
So, where does Meenakshi figure in this plot? "The conflict between Sanjay and Ramki involves Meenakshi. Her character is the suspense factor here," he says.
